**Welcome!**

This site is a companion web page to the description of baseline characteristics of the Let's Move It intervention participants, which will be submitted in 2018.

GitHub repository for the files can be found [here](https://github.com/heinonmatti/baseline-visu).

Data setup code used in all the sections can be found [here](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/heinonmatti/baseline-visu/master/baseline-datasetup.R).

A concise codebook for the variables can be accessed [here](Codebook-concise.html) and a more elaborate one [here](MISSING).

For issues, please contact matti.tj.heino@gmail.com.
